channel.title: Vpn after tor, clearnet leaks possible?
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm using whonix inside windows as a virtual machine and would like the connection to go tor->vpn-> internet. If I made some mistakes setting up the vpn inside whonix, would it be possible that my real (not tor or vpn) ip leaks?
Thank for your help!

item.title: Vpn after tor, clearnet leaks possible?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
carolynhughes:

If I made some mistakes setting up the vpn inside whonix, would it be possible that my real (not tor or vpn) ip leaks?

No.

Read full topic

item.source: Vpn after tor, clearnet leaks possible?

item.title: Vpn after tor, clearnet leaks possible?
item.dc:creator: madaidan
item.description:
VPNs will not help when used with Tor.

whonix.org – 22 Mar 20

Combining Tunnels with Tor - Whonix

Instructions on how to combine tunnels (VPN, SSH, proxy) with Tor. (User → Tor → proxy/VPN/SSH → Internet) (User → proxy/VPN/SSH → Tor → Internet)

Read full topic
